SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.ibm.jikes.skij
Class Scheme

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.Scheme
public class Scheme
extends Object

This class is used to start up Scheme as a standalone Java application. Use

java com.ibm.jikes.skij.Scheme [init options]
from a command line. The start methods provide a number of alternate ways to start Skij.
